In rerun::external::uuid

?

Type Alias rerun::external::uuid::Bytes

source · 
pub type Bytes = [u8; 16];
Expand description

A 128-bit (16 byte) buffer containing the UUID.

ABI

The Bytes type is always guaranteed to be have the same ABI as Uuid.
